trans-unit.source: When the recognizer receives input that matches a grammar, the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> object can raise the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.SpeechRecognized> event.
trans-unit.target: Quando o reconhecedor recebe entrada que corresponde a uma gramática, o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>objeto pode disparar o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.SpeechRecognized>evento.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.SpeechRecognized> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> object's <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.SpeechRecognized> event is raised prior to the speech recognizer's SpeechRecognized event.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>do objeto <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.SpeechRecognized>é gerado antes do evento SpeechRecognized do reconhecedor de fala.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.SpeechRecognized> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>

trans-unit.source: When you create a delegate for a SpeechRecognized event, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: Quando você cria um delegado para um evento SpeechRecognized, identifica o método que manipulará o evento.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Para associar o evento com o manipulador de eventos, adicione uma instância do representante ao evento.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: O manipulador de eventos é chamado sempre que o evento ocorre, a menos que você remova o delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Events and Delegates](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre delegados de manipulador de eventos, consulte [eventos e delegados](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the state of a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o estado de um <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: This read-only property indicates whether the shared recognizer resident in Windows is in the `Stopped` or the `Listening` state.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade somente leitura que indica se o reconhecedor compartilhado residente no Windows é o `Stopped` ou `Listening` estado.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerState> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerState>enumeração.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerState>

trans-unit.source: The state of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_SpeechRecognizer" name="SpeechRecognizer" href=""></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: O estado do <xref uid="langword_csharp_SpeechRecognizer" name="SpeechRecognizer" href=""> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the running state of the Windows Desktop Speech Technology recognition engine changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o estado de execução do mecanismo de reconhecimento de tecnologia de voz de área de trabalho do Windows é alterado.

trans-unit.source: The shared recognizer raises this event when the state of Windows Speech Recognition changes to the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerState> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerState> state.
trans-unit.target: O reconhecedor compartilhado gera esse evento quando muda o estado de reconhecimento de fala do Windows para o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerState>ou <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerState>estado.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerState> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerState>

trans-unit.source: To get the state of the shared recognizer at the time of the event, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.StateChangedEventArgs.RecognizerState%2A> property of the associated <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.StateChangedEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter o estado do reconhecedor compartilhado no momento do evento, use a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.StateChangedEventArgs.RecognizerState%2A>propriedade de <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.StateChangedEventArgs>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.StateChangedEventArgs> associado</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.StateChangedEventArgs.RecognizerState%2A>

trans-unit.source: To get the current state of the shared recognizer, use the recognizer's <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.State%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para obter o estado atual do reconhecedor compartilhado, use o reconhecedor <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.State%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.State%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you create a delegate for a StateChanged event, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: Quando você cria um delegado para um evento StateChanged, identifica o método que manipulará o evento.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Para associar o evento com o manipulador de eventos, adicione uma instância do representante ao evento.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: O manipulador de eventos é chamado sempre que o evento ocorre, a menos que você remova o delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Events and Delegates](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre delegados de manipulador de eventos, consulte [eventos e delegados](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Unloads all speech recognition grammars from the shared recognizer.
trans-unit.target: Descarrega todas as gramáticas de reconhecimento de fala do reconhecedor compartilhado.

trans-unit.source: If the recognizer is currently loading a grammar asynchronously, this method waits until the grammar is loaded, before it unloads all of the recognizer's grammars.
trans-unit.target: Se o reconhecedor está atualmente carregando uma gramática assincronamente, este método espera até que a gramática é carregada, antes de ele descarrega todas as gramáticas do reconhecedor.

trans-unit.source: To unload a specific grammar, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.UnloadGrammar%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para descarregar uma gramática específica, use o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.UnloadGrammar%2A>método.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.UnloadGrammar%2A>

trans-unit.source: Unloads a specified speech recognition grammar from the shared recognizer.
trans-unit.target: Descarrega uma gramática de reconhecimento de fala especificado do reconhecedor compartilhado.

trans-unit.source: If the recognizer is running, applications must use <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A> to pause the speech recognition engine before loading, unloading, enabling, or disabling a grammar.
trans-unit.target: Se o reconhecedor está em execução, os aplicativos devem usar <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>para pausar o mecanismo de reconhecimento de fala antes do carregamento, descarregamento, habilitar ou desabilitar uma gramática.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>

trans-unit.source: To unload all grammars, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.UnloadAllGrammars%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para descarregar todas as gramáticas, use o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.UnloadAllGrammars%2A>método.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.UnloadAllGrammars%2A>

trans-unit.source: The grammar to unload.
trans-unit.target: A gramática de ser descarregado.
